application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The start date for any works relating to the Written Scheme of Investigation should be communicated to GLAAS (on the details below) by the archaeological practice to enable GLAAS to conduct monitoring visits.
The archaeological condition will not be fully satisfied until all works are complete, including any post-excavation assessment/analysis leading to publication.
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 4 (Materials), 5 (Brick Samples), 7 (Windows and Doors), 9 (Landscaping) & 14 (Protection of Archaeological Remains) and the partial discharge of Condition 13 (Part A - Written Scheme of Investigation) in relation to planning application reference 14009/APP/2019/4088 (The erection of a detached cafe building, outdoor seating area with access, and minor alterations to the listed cellars beneath, minor alterations to the listed stable block with change of use to B1, extension to the existing car park, alterations to the existing information centre building and construction of bin store including all associated external works).
